specialRules.hint: Enemies charging this unit don’t count as having charged for the purpose of special rules, and they must take a dangerous terrain test before attacking.
specialRules.name: Dug In
specialRules.label: Dug In
specialRules.description: Enemies charging this unit don’t count as having charged for the purpose of special rules, and they must take a dangerous terrain test before attacking.

specialRules.hint: When the hero is activated pick one of the following tactics, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these rules until the end of the round: • Dash: +3” when moving.
specialRules.name: Guerrilla Tactics
specialRules.label: Guerrilla Tactics
specialRules.description: When the hero is activated pick one of the following tactics, and the hero and all friendly models within 12” get one of these rules until the end of the round: • Dash: +3” when moving.

specialRules.hint: The hero and up to half of your army get the Ambush special rule (must deploy within 3” of the hero).
specialRules.name: Hidden Tunnels
specialRules.label: Hidden Tunnels
specialRules.description: The hero and up to half of your army get the Ambush special rule (must deploy within 3” of the hero).

specialRules.hint: This model and all friendly units within 12” get the Regeneration rule.
specialRules.name: Medical Training
specialRules.label: Medical Training
specialRules.description: This model and all friendly units within 12” get the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.hint: This model may try to mark an enemy unit instead of firing one of its weapons. Pick one enemy unit within 36” and line of sight and roll one die, on a 4+ it’s marked. Friendly units may remove markers from the target to get +X to their shooting rolls against the marked unit, where X is the number of removed markers.
specialRules.name: Spotting Laser
specialRules.label: Spotting Laser
specialRules.description: This model may try to mark an enemy unit instead of firing one of its weapons. Pick one enemy unit within 36” and line of sight and roll one die, on a 4+ it’s marked. Friendly units may remove markers from the target to get +X to their shooting rolls against the marked unit, where X is the number of removed markers.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets +1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Flame Breath
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Protective Dome
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” gets Regeneration next time it takes wounds.

spells.name: Expel
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(4) and Deadly(3).

spells.name: Psychic Speed
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Tempest
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 6” takes 1 automatic hit per model.
